fields.title: Introduction to Python Programming
fields.description: Learn the basics of Python programming language. This course covers variables, data types, control structures, functions, and more.

fields.title: Getting Started with Python
fields.description: Learn how to set up your Python environment and write your first Python program.

fields.title: Python Basics
fields.description: Learn about variables, data types, and basic operations in Python.

fields.title: Installing Python
fields.content: In this lesson, you will learn how to install Python on your computer. Python is a versatile language...

fields.title: Your First Python Program
fields.content: In this lesson, you will write your first Python program. We'll start with the traditional 'Hello, World!' program...

fields.title: Python Quiz
fields.content: Test your knowledge of Python installation and basics.

fields.title: Variables and Data Types
fields.content: In this lesson, you will learn about variables and data types in Python...

fields.question: What command do you use to run a Python script named 'hello.py'?
fields.explanation: To run a Python script, you use the 'python' command followed by the filename.

fields.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid way to install Python?
choices: Use package manager like apt or brew
fields.explanation: Python is not typically available in the App Store. The recommended ways to install Python are through python.org, package managers, or distributions like Anaconda.

fields.question:
What is the output of the following code?

x = 5
y = 2
print(x + y)
fields.explanation: The code adds the values of x (5) and y (2), resulting in 7.

fields.title: Arabic for Beginners
fields.description: Learn the basics of Arabic language, including the alphabet, greetings, and essential vocabulary.

fields.title: Arabic Alphabet
fields.description: Learn the Arabic alphabet and how to pronounce each letter.

fields.title: Introduction to Arabic Script
fields.content: In this lesson, you will learn about the Arabic script and its characteristics...

fields.question: Is Arabic written from left to right?
fields.explanation: Arabic is written from right to left, unlike English and many other languages.
